text: Hum sirf teri hi ibadat kertay hain aur sirf tujh hi say madad chahatay hain Shuroo Allah kay naam say jo bara meharban nehayat reham kerney wala hai 62.1. (saari cheezen) jo aasmanon aur zamin mein hain Allah Taalaa ki paki biyan kerti hain (jo) badshah nihayat pak (hai) ghalib-o-ba hikmat 62.2. Wohi hai jiss ney na khuanda logon mein inn hi mein say aik rasool bheja jo enhen uss ki aayaten parh ker sunata hai aur inn ko pak kerta hai aur enhen kitab-o-hikmat sikhata hai. Yaqeenan yeh iss say pehlay khuli gumrahi mein thay 62.3. Aur doosron kay liye bhi unhi mein say jo abb tak inn say nahi milay aur wohi ghalib ba hikmat hai 62.4. Yeh Allah ka fazal hai jissay chahaye apna fazal dey aur Allah Taalaa boht baray fazal ka maalik hai
